issue.title: [R] Fix bad merge/Rcpp conflict
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9855](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9855). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-8001 merged after the switch to cpp11 but was based on master before it, so that brought some generated code that still referenced Rcpp

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9855?focusedCommentId=17184676) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8053
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8053>
